query.select: SELECT `groupID`, `storeID`, `StoreName`, `StorePhone`, `Addr1`, `Addr2`, `City`, `State`, `ZipCode`, `DisplayMode`, `Tax1`, `Tax2`, `Tax3`, `Tax4`, `createDate`, `updateDate` FROM settings {include refid="includeWhere"} ORDER BY groupID DESC

select `groupID`, `storeID` , `menuGroup` , (SELECT menuGroupName FROM `menugroup` WHERE groupID=a.groupID and storeID=a.storeID AND `menuGroup`=a.`menuGroup`) menuGroupName , `menuLevel`, `menuIdx`, `menuName`, `createDate`, `updateDate` , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `menuitem` b WHERE `menuGroup`=a.`menuGroup` and b.`menuIdx` = a.`menuIdx` AND `groupID` = #{groupID} and `storeID` = #{storeID} ) `cnt` from `menu` a {include refid="conditionWhere_menu"}

select `groupID`, `storeID`, `menuGroup`, `menuGroupName`, `imageFileName`, `createDate`, `updateDate` , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `menu` a WHERE a.menuGroup = b.menuGroup and `groupID` = #{groupID} and `storeID` = #{storeID}) `cnt` from `menugroup` b {include refid="conditionWhere_menugroup"}

select `groupID`, `storeID`, `menuGroup`, `menuLevel`, `menuIdx`, `itemDisplayIdx` , `itemID` ,(SELECT `itemName` FROM item a WHERE 1=1 and `groupID` = #{groupID} and `storeID` = #{storeID} AND a.`itemID` = b.`itemID`) `itemName` , `modifierGroupDisplayIdx`, `modifierGroupID`, `modifierItemDisplayIdx` , `modifierItemID`, `createDate`, `updateDate` from `menuitem` b {include refid="conditionWhere_menuitem"}
